name: Tropical Cyclone
description:
Based on the ZX Spectrum game "Cyclone" by Costa Panayi and published by Vortex.  You must travel around the archipelago collecting crates whilst avoiding the cyclone.

You can land on the helipads to refuel, but the crates must be taken back to the start base, indicated by the red circle on the map

CONTROLS
  • WASD - Left, right, forwards, backwards
  • Arrows up/down - Go up and down
  • C - Change camera view
  • R - Toggle Rope
  • M - View Map

Full instructions are included in the game.

FAQ

Does it have the original map?  No, this game uses procedural generation for the map, so no two games will have the same map.
